#include <stdio.h>
    #define LL long long
    #define siz 100000
     
    int c[siz+10], l[siz+10];
    int bin(int m, int s, int n)
    {
    int e=n, a=-1, b;
    if(l[n]<m)
    return 0;
    while(s<=e)
    if(l[(b=(s+e)/2)]>=m)
    e=(a=b)-1;
    else
    s=b+1;
    return n-a+1;
    }
     
    
int main()

    {
    int fall, p=0, i, j, n, k;
    LL r;
    for(i=2; i<=siz; l[i++]=p)
    if(!c[i])
    for(j=i+i,p++; j<=siz; c[j]++,j+=i);
    for(scanf("%d",&fall); fall--; printf("%lld\n",r))
    for(r=!(i=scanf("%d %d",&n,&k)); i<=n; r+=bin(l[i]+k-(!c[i]&&k),i,n),i++);
    return 0;
    }
